name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.rlnotes: git log $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0)..HEAD --oneline > release-notes.md && git add release-notes.md
scripts.bump: node version-bump.mjs && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && yarn rlnotes
scripts.release: git commit -m $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
